Why Choose Jupitair HVAC?

Over 15 years of experience serving North Texas with integrity, professionalism, and a commitment to your comfort. Here's what sets us apart.

Licensed & Insured Excellence

All our technicians are fully licensed, insured, and NATE certified. We maintain the highest industry standards and undergo continuous training on the latest HVAC technology.

  • ✓ Texas HVAC License #TACLA12345
  • ✓ EPA Section 608 Certified
  • ✓ NATE Certified Technicians
  • ✓ $2M Liability Insurance

Same-Day Service Promise

When your comfort is compromised, we respond fast. Most repairs completed the same day, with emergency service available 24/7 throughout North Texas.

  • ✓ Same-day service for most repairs
  • ✓ 2-hour emergency response
  • ✓ Fully stocked service vehicles
  • ✓ Weekend & holiday availability

Upfront, Transparent Pricing

No surprises, no hidden fees. We provide clear, upfront pricing before any work begins. You'll know exactly what you're paying for.

  • ✓ Free estimates on installations
  • ✓ Detailed written quotes
  • ✓ No hidden fees or charges
  • ✓ Financing available (OAC)
